testsuite.name: Verify Enrollment Draft - Back and Next pages navigation

testcase.name: ACT/Office hookup - Patient has Primary and Secondary Insurance

step.actions: Log in to LWC, navigate to Enrollments - ACT/Arrhythmia enrollment
step.expectedresults: System navigates the user to page 1 of ACT/Arrhythmia form

step.actions: Select 'Office Hookup' radio button out of offered two, and press Next button
step.expectedresults: User is navigated to page 2

step.actions: popuate all mandatory data for patients information and press 'next' button
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to next page

step.actions: Try to go backwards and press 'back' button
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to previous page 2

step.actions: Go next, populate all mandatory data where 'LifeStar ACT' is selected for 'Type' and press 'Next'
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to next page 'Primary Insurance Information'

step.actions: Enter some data and check in 'Secondary Insurance Carrier exists' and press 'next'
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to 'Secondary Insurance Information' page

step.actions: Enter some data and press 'Next'
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to 'Physician Certification of Medical Necessity' page

step.actions: Enter data and press 'Next'
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to summary page

step.actions: Press 'Save enrollment draft'
step.expectedresults: message pops up verifying draft is created

step.actions: press OK
step.expectedresults: enrollment draft is created with success and user is navigated to enrollment queue page

step.actions: search for the form created in step 9 and open it
step.expectedresults: form is opened on summary page

step.actions: go back 'till first page
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to page1, while all pages that were populated wih data are displaying in retrospective: 'Physician Certification of Medical Necessity' page, Sec.Ins.Info page, Prim.Ins.Info page,page 3, page 2, page 1

step.actions: go next till last page
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to summary page going through following pages: page 2, page 3, Prim.Ins.Info, Sec..Ins.Info, 'Physician Certification of Medical Necessity'.

step.actions: Log in to LWC and navigate to ACT/Arrhythmia enrollment
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to ACT form

step.actions: On first page check in 'Office Hookup' button and press next
step.expectedresults: 'Office Hookup' is selected and user is navigated to next page

step.actions: On second page besides all mandatory data, enter unique SSN
step.expectedresults: unique SSN is entered

step.actions: proceed to the last page and press 'Submit enrollment'
step.expectedresults: message pops up notifying that new forms has been submitted

step.actions: Press OK
step.expectedresults: User is navigated to enrollment queue page and email is sent to user account

step.actions: serach for the form created in step 3
step.expectedresults: form opens on summary page

step.actions: observe first section on the page
step.expectedresults: in the first section of the page, ' Lifewatch Patient Enrollment Form ACT' and  'Office Hookup' display

step.actions: Open the users account, verify the body email
step.expectedresults: In the first section 'New Enrollment' is visible.

step.actions: Log in to LWC and navigate to ACT/Arrhythmia enrollment
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to ARR form

step.actions: On first page check in 'Office Hookup' button and press next
step.expectedresults: 'Office Hookup' is selected and user is navigated to next page

step.actions: On second page besides all mandatory data, enter unique SSN
step.expectedresults: unique SSN is entered

step.actions: proceed to the last page and press 'Submit enrollment'
step.expectedresults: message pops up notifying that new forms has been submitted

step.actions: Press OK
step.expectedresults: User is navigated to enrollment queue page and email is sent to user account

step.actions: serach for the form created in step 3
step.expectedresults: form opens on summary page

step.actions: observe first section on the page
step.expectedresults: in the first section of the page, ' Lifewatch Patient Enrollment Form Arrhythmia' and  'Office Hookup' display

step.actions: Open the users account, verify the body email
step.expectedresults: In the first section 'New Enrollment' is visible.

step.actions: Log in to LWC and navigate to Enrollments - 'ACT Ex Enrollment'
step.expectedresults: User is navigated to 'ACT Ex Enrollment' enrollment form

step.actions: Enter mandatory fields on all pages, proceed to last page and verify sections and buttons.
step.expectedresults: User is navigated to summary page where are five buttons on the bottom of the page: Back, Print, Save Enrollment Draft, Cancel, Submit Enrollment.

step.actions: Verify first section data
step.expectedresults:
All that display within first panel is: title ' Lifewatch Patient Enrollment Form (ACT Ex) '.

On the left are: Phone (800) 700-3788 and 'Submitted By: user (username) username@lifewatch.com'.

On the right are: Fax (800) 260-8023 and 'The first device order is a: Office Hookup (or Send to Patient)'

step.actions: Verify that second panel include clinic and doctor information
step.expectedresults: Clinic and doctor labels and names are displayed.

step.actions: Verify the third page content
step.expectedresults: PCP Referring Physician When Applicable, PCP Referring Physician Phone # and checkbox 'Call PCP for MD Notification' are displayed

step.actions: Verify that fourth panel include patient information
step.expectedresults: This panel is labeled 'Patient Information' and all information that was entered for the patient display, excluding those fields that was not entered any data for.

step.actions: Verify that fourth panel show shipping information, in case the user created 'Send to Patient' form
step.expectedresults:
This panel is labeled 'Shipping information'.

Date that display within is: checked-in checkbox: 'Shipping Address is Same as Home Address' OR all data that was entered manually, excluding the chechbox mentioned above.

step.actions: Veriry that previous panel is not displayed if user created 'office Hookup' form
step.expectedresults: It is verified.

step.actions: Verify the next section contain only reminder.
step.expectedresults: Reminder: it is the provider's responsibility to select codes carried out to the highest level of specificity and selected from the ICD-9-CM code book appropriate to the year in which the service is rendered for the claim(s) submitted

step.actions: Verify the next section contain Monitor Hook-Up Information
step.expectedresults: Data that was entered previosly is displayed.

step.actions:
Verify the next section contain information about primary insurance.

Note that  this panel is on the summary page only if user has primary insurance.
step.expectedresults: This panel is labeled 'Primary Insurance Information:' and display only data that was entered.

step.actions:
Verify the next section contain information about secondary insurance.

Note that  this panel is on the summary page only if user has secondary insurance.
step.expectedresults: This panel is labeled 'Secondary Insurance Information:' and display only data that was entered.

step.actions:
Verify the last panel contain medical necessity information.

Note this panel display only in case if user has insurance.
step.expectedresults: This panel is labeled 'Physician Certification of Medical Necessity' and contain only data that was entered or selected.

step.actions: Verify that last three panels are about Standard Order Protocol
step.expectedresults: Next panel is labeled as 'ACTEx Satandard Order Protocol' and next two following panels are about it.

step.actions: Log in to LWC and navigate to ACT Ex enrollment
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to ACT Ex form

step.actions: On first page check in 'Send to Patient' button and press next
step.expectedresults: 'Send to Patient' is selected and user is navigated to next page

step.actions: On second page besides all mandatory data, enter unique SSN
step.expectedresults: unique SSN is entered

step.actions: proceed to the last page and press 'Submit enrollment'
step.expectedresults: message pops up notifying that new forms has been submitted

step.actions: Press OK
step.expectedresults: User is navigated to enrollment queue page and email is sent to user account

step.actions: serach for the form created in step 3
step.expectedresults: form opens on summary page

step.actions: observe first section on the page
step.expectedresults: in the first section of the page, 'Lifewatch Patient Enrollment Form (ACT Ex)' and  'Send to Patient' display

step.actions: Open the users account, verify the body email
step.expectedresults: In the first section 'New Enrollment' is visible.

step.actions: Log in to LWC and navigate to Holter enrollment
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to Holter form

step.actions: On first page check in 'Office Hookup' button and press next
step.expectedresults: 'Office Hookup' is selected and user is navigated to next page

step.actions: On second page besides all mandatory data, enter unique SSN
step.expectedresults: unique SSN is entered

step.actions: proceed to the last page and press 'Submit enrollment'
step.expectedresults: message pops up notifying that new forms has been submitted

step.actions: Press OK
step.expectedresults: User is navigated to enrollment queue page and email is sent to user account

step.actions: serach for the form created in step 3
step.expectedresults: form opens on summary page

step.actions: observe first section on the page
step.expectedresults: in the first section of the page, ' Lifewatch Patient Enrollment Form (Holter)' and  'Office Hookup' display

step.actions: Open the users account, verify the body email
step.expectedresults: In the first section 'New Enrollment' is visible.

step.actions: Log in to LWC and navigate to Enrollments - 'Holter Enrollment'
step.expectedresults: User is navigated to 'Holter Enrollment' form

step.actions: Enter mandatory fields on all pages, proceed to last page and verify sections and buttons.
step.expectedresults: User is navigated to summary page where are five buttons on the bottom of the page: Back, Print, Save Enrollment Draft, Cancel, Submit Enrollment.

step.actions: Verify first section data
step.expectedresults:
All that display within first panel is: title ' Lifewatch Patient Enrollment Form (Holter)'.

On the left are: Phone (800) 700-3788 and 'Submitted By: user (username) username@lifewatch.com'.

On the right are: Fax (800) 260-8023 and 'The first device order is a: Office Hookup (or Send to Patient)'

step.actions: Verify that second panel include clinic and doctor information
step.expectedresults: Clinic and doctor labels and names are displayed.

step.actions: Verify the third page content
step.expectedresults: PCP Referring Physician When Applicable, PCP Referring Physician Phone # are displayed.

step.actions: Verify that fourth panel include patient information
step.expectedresults: This panel is labeled 'Patient Information' and all information that was entered for the patient display, excluding those fields that was not entered any data for.

This panel is labeled 'Shipping information'.

Date that display within is: checked-in checkbox: 'Shipping Address is Same as Home Address' OR all data that was entered manually, excluding the chechbox mentioned above.

step.expectedresults: It is verified.

step.actions: Verify the next section contain Monitor Hook-Up Information
step.expectedresults: Data that was entered previosly is displayed.

step.actions:
Verify the next section contain information about primary insurance.

Note that  this panel is on the summary page only if user has primary insurance.

step.expectedresults: 'Physician Name:' and 'Date' labels and fields display verified.

step.actions: Log in to LWC and navigate to  Enrollments tab, Enrollment Forms - Pacemaker
step.expectedresults: Pacemaker form is opened

step.actions: Select 'Lifewatch Care Center' from clinic dropdown, and for doctor select 'Welby Marcus'
step.expectedresults: These specific Clinic and doctor are selected.

step.actions: Populate all mandatory fields
step.expectedresults: Clinic, Doctor, Patient Information fields and ICD Codes are ppulated as mandatory

step.actions: Press 'Save enrollment draft'
step.expectedresults: Message pops up

step.actions: Press OK
step.expectedresults: new form is saved

step.actions: Navigate to enrollment queue page and search for recent form
step.expectedresults: Specific form is lislted in data grid results

step.actions: click on  Open link and observe the page
step.expectedresults:
On summary page it should be said that the form is pacemaker and was submitted by user from step 1.

For ex:  "Lifewatch Patient Enrollment Form (Pacemaker)

Submitted By: FirstName LastName (username) username@lifewatch.com"

testsuite.name: Verify Enrollment Draft - Back and Next pages navigation

testcase.name: HST-NEW-Primary/Secondary Insurance; Shipping address is the same as home address; Saved then Submit

step.actions: Log in to LWC, navigate to Enrollments - HST enrollment form.
step.expectedresults: System navigates the user to page 1 of HST form.

step.actions: Select clinic and doctor from respective dropdowns. Key in all the data into Patient Information section. Check "Shipping Address Is same as Home Address" check box and press 'next' button.
step.expectedresults: User is navigated to the next Physician Certification of Medical Necessity page.

step.actions: Click on the calendar icon for  "Enrollments Start" date and select the date.
step.expectedresults: Data is visible in the respective field.

step.actions: Do not enter Height and Weight into respectvie fields and click "Next" button.
step.expectedresults: "Height is Required" and "Weight is Required" error messages are visible at the buttom of the screen in red.

step.actions: Enter Height and Weight into respective fields and click next button.
step.expectedresults: User is navigated to 'Primary Insurance Information' page .

step.actions: Enter Primary insurance informaiton, check 'Secondary Insurance Carrier exists' check box and press 'next' button.
step.expectedresults: User is navigated to 'Secondary Insurance Information' page.

step.actions: Enter Secondary insurance information into respective fields and press 'Next' button.
step.expectedresults: User is navigated to Summary page.

step.actions: Verify Summary page:
step.expectedresults:
Enrolled by section - your userid is visible;

Clinic and Doctor names are visible in Clinic and doctor section.

Data is valid in Patient Information section;

"Shipping Address is same as Home Address" check box (checked) and label visible;

Physician Certification of Medical Necessity information is visible; Primary and Secondary Insurance section and their information are visible.

step.actions: Press 'Save enrollment draft'
step.expectedresults: "Enrollment Draft was successfully saved" confirmation message pops up.

step.actions: press OK
step.expectedresults: System navigates to the enrollment queue page.

step.actions: Enter last name or the portion of the last name of the patinet who just had newly created enrollment and click "Search" button.
step.expectedresults: the record or list of records matching search criteria are populated in the data grid.

step.actions: Click "Open" link of the specific record.
step.expectedresults: the summary page is loaded.

step.actions: go back 'till first page.
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to page1, while all pages that were populated wih data are displaying in retrospective: 'Physician Certification of Medical Necessity' page, Sec.Ins.Info page, Prim.Ins.Info page,page 3, page 2, page 1

step.actions: go next till last page
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to summary page going through following pages: page 2, page 3, Prim.Ins.Info, Sec..Ins.Info, 'Physician Certification of Medical Necessity'.

step.actions: When at the Summary page click "Submit" button.
step.expectedresults: "New enrollment - Your request has been successfully emailed to your Customer Service Representative" confirmation message pops up.

step.actions: Click "OK" button.
step.expectedresults: system navigates to Enrollment Queue.

step.actions: Login to PA and search for patient by patient last name or patient ID (wich is SSN in LWC)
step.expectedresults: The record or list of records matching search criteria are populated in the data grid.

step.actions: Login to SA and search for patient by last name.
step.expectedresults: Patient is found and and enrollment has been created in SA.

step.actions: Check the Email for enrollment email notification.
step.expectedresults: Enrollment email notifcation exists.

step.actions: Open enrolment email notification and reopen enrollment in LWC via Enrollment Queue. Verify data.
step.expectedresults: It is  indicated as a New enrollment. Data match.

testcase.name: HST-Verify that two diagnosis codes and the ICD banner have been added to HST form
testcase.summary:
- Diagnosis codes added are 780.53 - Obstructive Sleep apnea (Adult) (Pediatric)

 -ICD banner added: Reminder: it is the provider's responsibility to select codes carried out to the highest level of specificity and selected from the ICD-9-CM code book appropriate to the year in which the service is rendered for the claim(s) submitted

step.actions: Log in to LWC, navigate to Enrollments - HST enrollment form.
step.expectedresults: System navigates the user to page 1 of HST form.

step.actions: Select/enter all requried data on the demographic page and click "Next".
step.expectedresults: User is navigated to the next Physician Certification of Medical Necessity page.

step.actions: Observe the page.
step.expectedresults: Office visit section: Date is not requried field. The "Medicare requires an office visit to prescrive Home Sleep Testing"  statement has been removed.

step.actions: Verify Diagnosis: Expand the "Diagnosis Code" dropdown and observe the values in it.
step.expectedresults: Obstructive sleep apnea (Adult) (Pediatric) - (327.23) , Hypersomnia with sleep apnea - (780.53), Unspecified and  Hypeersomnia, Unspecified - (780.54) are added.

step.actions: Observe the page and Verify banner:
step.expectedresults: Reminder: it is the provider's responsibility to select codes carried out to the highest level of specificity and selected from the ICD-9-CM code book appropriate to the year in which the service is rendered for the claim(s) submitted.

step.actions: Enter all the required data into respective fields, check the "Patient does not have insurance or is self pay" check button, Select one of the newly added Diagnosis code and click Next.
step.expectedresults: Sumamry page is loaded.

step.actions: Verify Summary page:
step.expectedresults:
Newly Diagnosis selected is displayed on the Physician Certification of Medical Necessity section; ICD banner is visible and reads:

Reminder: it is the provider's responsibility to select codes carried out to the highest level of specificity and selected from the ICD-9-CM code book appropriate to the year in which the service is rendered for the claim(s) submitted.

step.actions: Press 'Save enrollment draft'
step.expectedresults: "Enrollment Draft was successfully saved" confirmation message pops up.

step.actions: press OK
step.expectedresults: System navigates to the enrollment queue page.

step.actions: Enter last name or the portion of the last name of the patient who just had newly created enrollment and click "Search" button.
step.expectedresults: the record or list of records matching search criteria are populated in the data grid.

step.actions: Click "Open" link of the desired record.
step.expectedresults: The summary page is loaded.

step.actions: When at the Summary page click "Submit" button.
step.expectedresults: "New enrollment - Your request has been successfully emailed to your Customer Service Representative" confirmation message pops up.

step.actions: Click "OK" button.
step.expectedresults: system navigates to Enrollment Queue.

step.actions: Repeat step 8.

testcase.name: Enrollment Queue - Verify Search
testcase.summary: This test covers all the crieterias and combination of all the crieterias

step.actions: Log in LWC applicaton, and navigate to Ebrollment Queue
step.expectedresults: user is navigated to Enrollment Queue

step.actions: Do a search by Clinic fliter "Lifewatch Care Center"
step.expectedresults: Results only with Lifewatch Care center clinic, are displayed in the grid

step.actions: Do a search by other filters: Doctor, Status, Service
step.expectedresults: results related to search filter display in the grid

step.actions: Enter name in 'Patient Last Name' and press Search
step.expectedresults: Results that contain that specific name entered in the search field, are listed in the grid

step.actions: In Clinic dropdown choose one clinic
step.expectedresults: Specified clinic is listed in Clinic dropdown

step.actions: In Doctor dropdown choose one of the listed doctors
step.expectedresults: Specified doctor is listed in Doctor dropdown and patients are listed for the specified clinic and doctor

step.actions: Back to the clinic dropdown and choose --Select clinic--
step.expectedresults: ' --Select clinic-- '  is listed in Clinic dropdown and Doctor dropdown is updated with "--Select Doctor--"

step.actions: Click on Search button
step.expectedresults: All Patient are listed

step.actions: Navigate to Enrollments/Enrollment Queue.
step.expectedresults: Enrollment Queue is loaded and no previous search criteria has been saved. No records displayed in datagrid.

testcase.name: Reports - Validate Search Type - validate "My Patients" radio button

step.actions: Navigate to LifeWatch Connect web site
step.expectedresults: "LifeWatch Connect"' Login screen is loaded.

step.actions: Enter the Valid Admin UserId and Password in the corresponding fields and click Login button.
step.expectedresults: User is login in the application

step.actions: Navigate to Reports - Patient Reports tab
step.expectedresults: Patient Reports is loaded

step.actions: Check 'My Patients' radio button
step.expectedresults: My Patients radio button is checked

step.actions: In Clinic dropdown choose "--SELECT CLINIC--" and then check doctor dropdown
step.expectedresults: Only added doctors (from User Management - Select Doctor) are displayed

testcase.name: Status - Validate Service Type - All section (Functional)

step.actions: Double-click on LifeWatch Connect icon from the desktop.
step.expectedresults: "LifeWatch Connect"' Login screen is loaded.

step.actions: Enter the Valid Admin UserId and Password in the corresponding fields and click Login button.
step.expectedresults: User is logged

step.actions: Navigate to Patient Status.
step.expectedresults: Patient Status page is loaded.

step.actions: Select for Service Type status ALL
step.expectedresults: ALL status is displayed

step.actions: Select one clinic from the dropdown
step.expectedresults: Selected clinc is displayed

step.actions: Select one of the doctors who are listed in the dropdowns
step.expectedresults: Selected doctor is displayed

step.actions: Select for Enrollment Status status ALL
step.expectedresults: Selected status is displayed

step.actions: Enter valid text for Patient Filter
step.expectedresults: Entered text is displayed

step.actions: Click on Seach button
step.expectedresults: All patients that belong to specified clinic and doctor and have enrollment statuses and types 'All' are displayed in the DataGrid

testcase.name: AFTC/Basic flow//OH/Same as Home ship address/Ablation/ACT/ICD9Code<>426.9/NoIns/Submit
testcase.summary: Basic flow: This test case will verify AFTC office hookup Ablation Enrollment  with ICD-9 only and with no Insurance can be successfully and enrollment will be created in PA and SA.

step.actions: Navigate to LWC web site
step.expectedresults: "LifeWatch Connect"' Login screen is loaded.

step.actions: Enter the Valid Admin UserId and Password in the corresponding fields and click Login button.
step.expectedresults: the Welcome page has been loaded.

step.actions: Navigate to Enrollment tab - AFTC enrollment
step.expectedresults: AFTC enrollment page is loaded

step.actions: Choose office hookup on a first page and click "Next" button.
step.expectedresults:
Page #2 is loaded. Title of the page is: "LifeWatch AF TeleClinic Enrollment Form".

All PCP related fields has not been displayed.

The last page section displays shipping information.

step.actions: In the clinic/doctor expand the clinic driodown.
step.expectedresults: Only clinic with AFTC in the name are shown in the drop down.

step.actions: Enter all reqeuired data into respective fields and click "Next" button.
step.expectedresults: Page #3 Patient schedule has been loaded. New section to capture scheduling information is visible. Three options: Ablation, CardioVersion, and Medical Therapy are avaiable for the user to choose.

step.actions: Click the calendar icon.
step.expectedresults: Calendar pops-up. The current date is indicatied in yellow.

step.actions: Validate data in treatment date field: Try to enter none numeric values into field. Try to enter numeric values.
step.expectedresults: Nothing happens. Field remain not editable for none numeric values. fields accepts numeric values.

step.actions: Enter valid date for Date of Treatment manually or by expanding the calendar icon. Choose Ablation radio button
step.expectedresults: The screen expands. The  timeline displaying Today's date, Date Of Treatment, and Enrollment dates and the Schedule table displaying Date of Enrollments, Device Type, Duration, and Interval are visible.

step.actions: Validate default schedule of enrollment dates on a timeline and a datagrid
step.expectedresults: Default values for Ablation are:14 days; Device type - ACT; enrollment date - today's date;180 days from today;180 days from previous date  and  180 days from previous date

step.actions: Click "Next" button.
step.expectedresults: Page # 4 is loaded.

step.actions: Observe page 4.
step.expectedresults: Section 1 has a label "Serial Number for the first device order" following with red astrick and input field.

step.actions: enter serial number, select ICD-9 code <> 426.9 from ICD-9 Diagnosis code. Check "Patient does not have insurance or is self pay" check box.
step.expectedresults: serial number is visible in the respected field, "Reminder: it is the provider's responsibility to select codes carried out ot the highest level of specificity and selected from ICD-9-CM code book appropriate to the year in which the service is rendered for the claim(s) submitted" is read, ICD-9 code <> 426.9 is visible in the respective field.

step.actions: Click Next.
step.expectedresults: Summary page is loaded.

step.actions: Observe summary page.
step.expectedresults: All the entered information previously entered is displayed. new sections: Shipping information (for office hookup), Patient Schedule are displayed with the proper data.

step.actions: Click "save enrollment Draft".
step.expectedresults: "Enrollment Draft was successfully saved - confirmation message has been displayed.

step.actions: Click "Ok".
step.expectedresults: System takes you to Enrollment Queue.

step.actions: Search for newly created enrollment draft by Last name.
step.expectedresults: The data grid is displayed and enrollment draft record visible in the grid. Open link and "Delete" button are visible.

step.actions: Click "Open" link.
step.expectedresults: The summary page of the enrollemnt draft has been loaded.

step.actions: Verify data on Summary page. (test data spreasheet will be providied).
step.expectedresults: Data match.

step.actions: Click "Submit" enrollment.
step.expectedresults: Confirmation message pops-up.

step.actions: Click "OK".
step.expectedresults: System redirects to enrollment Queue.

step.actions: Log in to PA and search for newly created enrollment in LWC.
step.expectedresults: Record has been found.

step.actions: In the left panel tree expand the devices folder.
step.expectedresults: Device is visible in the folder.

step.actions: Log in to SA and verify enrollment record has been generated.
step.expectedresults: Record found and enrollment has been generated for the patient.
